term.title: equalization of electronegativity, principle of

item.text: The postulate that in a molecule all the constituent atoms should have same electronegativity value, which would be the geometric mean of the electronegativities of isolated atoms.

sources.item: PAC, 1999, 71, 1919. 'Glossary of terms used in theoretical organic chemistry' on page 1938 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199971101919)
